description: The code among the gym room warriors has been written: Walketh nobly and striketh thine opponent with a sure fist and unwavering roundhouses. See Brad slam Marcus's eager hole hard on the mats as both fighters harness the ancient essence of the gym room warrior!  Enjoy!
title: Warrior's Desire
